hampHill.name: Hampton Hills
hampHill.tweet:
Update: 6/15/2022 - Trails are OPEN. Temps will be extreme today, ride safely and stay hydrated.

Reminder: No drinking fountain available, please bring plenty of water.

eastRim.name: East Rim
eastRim.tweet: East Rim Trails are Open and clear of all spiderwebs on 6/13/22. Thanks to the hard working trail volunteers that cleared trees and weed whacked. Trail is primo!!

bedford.name: Bedford
bedford.tweet: Bedford remains open today Wednesday June 15th even though it remains rather wet from the recent rains. Be prepared to get muddy as you ride through the remaining wet areas.

royalView.name: Royalview
royalView.tweet: Royalview remains OPEN Wed. 6-15.  Yellow still has some muddy spots, and there is still a tree down near the bottom of Red West. Keep an eye out for a loose dog.

OECR.name: Ohio & Erie Canal Reservation
OECR.tweet: Ohio & Erie Canal flow trails are closed today due to rainfall 6/7

vulturesKnob.name: Vultures Knob
vulturesKnob.tweet: 5/28 Trail Status: OPEN - but use caution ⚠️ We have a tree down for sure after Suspension Bridge. Hopefully nothing too muddy. Use your best judgement. https://t.co/zZ1s9RycBE
